https://waldo.r-lib.org

```{r}
library(waldo)
```



```{r}
vector_a <- c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e")
vector_b <- c("a", "b", "c", "f")

compare(vector_a, vector_b)
```

```{r}
tabla_a <- tibble(variable_ead32 = 1, 
       variable_efe23 = 1, 
       variable_eea31 = 1, 
       variable_edr52 = 1, 
       variable_ead30 = 1, 
       variable_eae31 = 1) 

tabla_b <- tibble(variable_ead32 = 1, 
       variable_efe23 = 1, 
       variable_eae31 = 1, 
       variable_ede52 = 1, 
       variable_ead30 = 1, 
       variable_eae30 = 1) 

compare(tabla_a, tabla_b)
```
